title: 2000/268/EC, Euratom: Council Decision of 30 March 2000 appointing a Swedish member of the Economic and Social Committee
header:
Council Decision
of 30 March 2000
appointing a Swedish member of the Economic and Social Committee
(2000/268/EC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 258 thereof,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 166 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 15 September 1998 appointing the members of the Economic and Social Committee for the period from 21 September 1998 to 20 September 2002(1),
Whereas a member's seat on that Committee has fallen vacant following the resignation of Ms Anita Harriman, of which the Council was informed on 12 March 1999;
Having regard to the nominations submitted by the Swedish Government,
Having obtained the opinion of the Commission of the European Communities,
main_body: Ms Inger Persson is hereby appointed a member of the Economic and Social Committee in place of Ms Anita Harriman for the remainder of her term of office, which runs until 20 September 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 March 2000.
For the Council
The President
J. Sรณcrates
(1) OJ L 257, 19.9.1998, p. 37.
